metadata.title: CVE-2023-43826 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Guacamole 1.5.3 and older do not consistently ensure that valuesreceived from a VNC server will not result in integer overflow. If a userconnects to a malicious or compromised VNC server, specially-crafted datacould result in memory corruption, possibly allowing arbitrary code to beexecuted with the privileges of the running guacd process.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.5.4, which fixes this issue.

criterions.comment: guacamole-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
